Package index

Create

Create an ethdate object from numeric, character, or other date classes

eth_date()
Create an Ethiopian Date Object
eth_make_date()
Make Ethiopian Date
eth_parse_date()
Parse Ethiopian Date

Extract

Extract date components from ethdate objects

eth_year() eth_month() eth_monthname() eth_day() eth_weekday() eth_quarter()
Ethiopian Date Components

Plot

Plot ethdate object with ggplot2

scale_x_ethdate() scale_y_ethdate() eth_breaks() eth_labels()
Plotting Ethiopian Date

Show

Show month or day names

eth_show() eth_today() eth_now()
See Month or Day Names

Utils

S3 class helpers

is_eth_date() is_eth_leap() as.Date(<ethdate>) as.double(<ethdate>) as.character(<ethdate>) format(<ethdate>)
Utils

Data

Monthly FAO Food Price Index 2001-2023 for Ethiopia

cpieth
Monthly FAO Food Price Index 2001-2023
